message.raw: Light everything outside shadowmaps' depth range, so we no longer need to cut off shadow at shadowFarDistance. This lets more of the farthest shadow map be used.
message.html: Light everything outside shadowmaps' depth range, so we no longer need to cut off shadow at shadowFarDistance. This lets more of the farthest shadow map be used.

message: Light everything outside shadowmaps' depth range, so we no longer need to cut off shadow at shadowFarDistance. This lets more of the farthest shadow map be used.
